title: replace the phone under warranty
content:
I have a Case ID case opened [7-2678000024254] The problem with the first 128GB pixel, the problem with the audio chip, a fairly well-known problem.
But I still can’t find an intermediary to send the phone to Australia. Can I still send the phone to the USA to replace it. It’s just been a year already, and it’s almost impossible to use a telephone.
